ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 67
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the answer, but your guild mate might not wanna do it, lowers faction with qeynos guards as it s a sk quest basically, anyone can do the first part,
ygData.messageBody:
I have the answer, but your guild mate might not wanna
do it, lowers faction with qeynos guards as it's a sk
quest basically, anyone can do the first part, give
the tunic to ton firepride for a few silver, and then
if you're not kos you can giveit to someone in the sk
guild for a small item and possibly a ring ofthe rat,
butit's all bad faction, and it seems to be a bug
because you get the tunic from taren's tacklebox quest
and not from killing hurrieta as you would think you
would...
